ing: 2 Granny Smith apples - peeled, cored, and cut into chunks
2 tablespoons lemon juice, or to taste (optional)
des: "Everything you love about a Mojito except the rum! After having a few friends over for some mojitos, I was in the mood for salad the next day and had all the right ingredients -- better than the hair of the dog!"
ins: Combine the lime zest, lime juice, romaine lettuce, apple, cucumber, mint, simple syrup, and lemon juice together in a large bowl; toss to combine.
